# Data Description
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidycovid19)
library(zoo)
library(kableExtra)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

# Data Story
```{r}
test <- download_merged_data(silent = TRUE, cached = TRUE) %>%
  filter(country == "Argentina")
test %>%
  select(iso3c, country) %>%
head() %>%
  kable() %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("bordered", "striped", "hover"))
```
